about_the_game:
Welcome to Void Harvest, a thrilling space exploration and mining adventure where the universe is your playground. Take command of your own customizable spaceship and chart your course through a galaxy teeming with mystery, danger, and untold riches.

Key Features:

🌌 Explore the Unknown:
Navigate through breathtaking systems, uncover hidden anomalies, and unlock the secrets of the universe. From luminous nebulae to desolate asteroid belts, every corner of space holds wonders—and perils.

⛏️ Mine Asteroids, Harvest Riches:
Turn cosmic rubble into valuable resources. Utilize advanced mining tools and techniques to extract rare ores, but beware—each asteroid could conceal hidden dangers.

🔧 Craft and Customize:
Use your mined resources to craft cutting-edge modules and upgrades. Unlock blueprints, enhance your ship, and build the perfect vessel.

👩‍🚀 Assemble Your Crew:
Recruit skilled crew members to aid you on your journey. Each brings unique abilities, from expert mining skills to advanced ship management, giving you an edge in the vastness of space.

⚙️ Upgrade and Evolve:
Grow your ship from a humble mining vessel into a legendary spacecraft capable of taking on the toughest challenges. Experiment with different loadouts and strategies to overcome environmental hazards, limited resources, and hostile encounters.

💎 Dynamic Gameplay:
No two playthroughs are the same. Procedurally generated star systems ensure every expedition feels fresh, while a variety of events keep you on your toes.

🔥 Survive and Thrive:
Fuel is scarce, cargo holds are limited, and hazards abound. Only the smartest and most resourceful pilots will turn a humble mining ship into a galactic legend.

Are you ready to carve your name among the stars? The galaxy is waiting—venture forth and claim it in Void Harvest!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 64-bit processor with 4 cores or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full OpenGL 4.6 support
